select project.*, employ.name as enterpriseName, employ.avatar as enterpriseAvatar, (select count(*) from project_order where project_order.project_id = project.id and project_order.status = 'ACCEPTED') as orderCount, (select count(*) from submission where submission.project_id = project.id) as submissionCount from project left join enterprise on project.enterprise_id = enterprise.id left join employ on enterprise.employ_id = employ.id
and project.title like concat('%', #{title}, '%') and project.status = #{status} and project.enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId}
and project.skills_required like concat('%', #{skillsRequired}, '%')
and employ.name like concat('%', #{enterpriseName}, '%')
order by project.created_at desc
